Text:
Gregory Klimov "Bozhyi Narod", 14 video lectures, 1989, Russian

14 videolectures of Gregory Klimov, recorded before his book "Bozhyi Narod" was written.
This video was recorded in 1989 at the writer's home in NY, USA.

Duration: appx. 25 hours.
Quality: VHSRip, H.264/AVC, 720x480, 1200 kb/s
Audio: Russian, AAC, 192 kb/s
